description: This product is one of our best selling and popular prodcut; Because of its elegance and the beauty of its design, we advise you to buy it quickly before it runs out of stock.

title: Micro Poly (Nirmal)
description: Outstanding customer service! Helpful from the first call to the last when the order is finalized. The design team helped create a refreshed look to our school logo for printing. We appreciated all the suggestions with regard to color of T-shirts and printing colors. They are the experts and have a great eye for what will look awesome

title: Micro Poly (Nirmal)
description: Recently ordered dri fit shirts for youth cricket team in Delhi University. Got excellent service from wedesigne and her team members. We will not order anywhere else, consider us to be one of your loyal customers. Thank you

title: Micro Poly (Nirmal)
description: I ordered custom t-shirts for my staff for the grand opening of our new bookstore. The people at Wedesigne  were wonderful! From the initial order to the very fast shipping, the experience was great. I received updates about the process and pictures of my shirts being printed. When the shirts arrived, they were very well packaged and in perfect condition. The shirts fit great, and we received many compliments on them at the grand opening. I couldn't be more pleased!
